attributes.title: Episode 1
attributes.description: Burnie and Joel welcome you to Season 2 of The Gauntlet! Thousands of attendees at RTX 2013 battled it out for the chance to make it onto the show. Find out who will advance to the next round of the competition on the debut episode of The Gauntlet!

attributes.title: Episode 2: The Interviews
attributes.description: Contestants compete on the RTX Center Stage and then face Joel in an intense one on one interview. How will they do Watch Episode 2 of The Gauntlet to find out.

attributes.title: Episode 3: King of Halo
attributes.description: Teams from Rooster Teeth, Achievement Hunter, the RTX Community are joined with an Internet Allstar cast to compete for the honor to call themselves least worst gamers in The Gauntlet!

attributes.title: Episode 4: The Sonic Relay
attributes.description: Team Internet, Team Achievement Hunter and Team Rooster Teeth face off in an elimination tag relay through 20 years of Sonic the Hedgehog Games.

attributes.title: Episode 5: Portal 2 Puzzle
attributes.description: Teams AH, RT and RTX compete in a series of games that require them to communicate with each other in an efficient and productive way. Watch and find out who is the best of the worst.

attributes.title: Episode 6: AH fights Team RTX
attributes.description: Team Achievement Hunter and Team RTX face off in a fierce elimination tournament!

attributes.title: Episode 7: Unreal Tournament 2004
attributes.description: Teams Rooster Teeth and RTX have a showdown to see who will go to the final episode and then all the losing teams are brought back for a free for all redemption round deathmatch. He or She who finds redemption will join Team RTX or Rooster Teeth in the final episode.

attributes.title: Episode 8: The Finale: Hitler Must Die
attributes.description: And now, the exciting conclusion to The Gauntlet.
attributes.display_title: Episode 8: The Finale: Hitler Must Die
